scripts.start: dapr run --app-id cns-dapr-client --app-port 3100 --app-protocol http --resources-path ../cns-dapr/components --log-level error -- node index
scripts.subscribe: dapr run --app-id cns-dapr-subscribe --app-port 3100 --app-protocol http --resources-path ../cns-dapr/components -- node subscribe
scripts.list: dapr run --app-id cns-dapr-list --log-level error -- node list
scripts.profile: dapr run --app-id cns-dapr-profile --log-level error -- node profile
